BabelShark::Observer

virtual void Update (Subject *subject)

Detailed Description

Observer is another abstract class for the observer pattern It represents the base class for any number of concrete observers Currently these are planned to be instruction sizes or aliased instructions In the future could be more uses

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

BabelShark::Observer::Observer (  )  [inline]

Empty constructor since its an abstract class

BabelShark::Observer::~Observer (  )  [inline]

Empty destructor since its an abstract class

Member Function Documentation

virtual void BabelShark::Observer::Update ( Subject *  subject  )  [inline, virtual]

This is where the actual work of the pattern will take place Still an abstract class though, so it will happen at the concrete observer level.

Reimplemented in BabelShark::DynamicDefinition, and BabelShark::Instruction.
